title: Improve UX regarding Default Connection values
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
**Context:**
The user would like to change the default protocol for all new connections to be SSHv2 rather than RDP.

**User Journey:**
1. Left click the Connections tree node
1. Click the **Default Properties** button at the top of the config window.
1. Set the appropriate property to `SSH version 2`
